page.title: 07HOUSING
page.content: This survey looked at dwellings in our area.We surveyed 1587 homes and 783{ {(49%)}were detached,334{(21%)}were semis and 470{(29%)}were terraced. There were 1226{(77%)}houses,281{(18%) bungalows,78{(5%)}flats.1198{(75%)}of the homes had garages. This is a dormitory area with most people working elsewhere.It is expanding with{66%}of houses built in the last 25 years.Other ages are 25-50 {18%,}50-75{6%,}75-100{4%,}100-200{2%,} 200+{2%.} {Materials.} 1433{(90%)}of the homes had brick walls,another 119{(8%)}had brick walls with tile or wood fronts.1412{(88%)} had tile roofs,78{(5%)}had slate roofs,22{(1%)}had thatch roofs and 75{ {(5%)}used other or more than one material.372{(24%)}were council houses and 1215{(76%)}were privately owned.
